textField.title:
You have just signed up for
the evian Live Young Training.
textField.subTitle:
It's time for a few weeks of training !
You will improve your Youth Quotient easily thanks to
simple and fun exercises.
Let's begin with some brains exercises !

textField.title:
Test your
intellectual agility
textField.subTitle:
This week, we'll be stimulating your mind...
Are you ready?

textField.game:
Count the bottles that go
into and out of the box.
Calculate how many remain
inside the box in the end.

box.text:
How many bottles
are in this box?

bubble.text:
And this water is
primarily renewed by
the water you drink.

Drink a glass of evian
as you contemplate
that thought.

intro.text:
Use the arrows on your
keyboard to move around
and avoid external elements

bubble.text:
Did you know that the evian
water you drink is all natural
and perfectly pure?

Just as Nature
has made it for
thousands of years.

textField.title:
Protected, deep in the heart of the Northern Alps,
evian natural spring water shares its original purity
with you each and every day.
textField.subTitle:
Since its aquifer is far beneath, the Earth's surface, evian water
preserves all of its original purity. Bottled right at the source, it
keeps all of its wonderful qualities. The aquifer remains just like
Nature made it thousands of years ago.

textField.title: Congratulations,
textField.subTitle:
you've done a great job. But don't stop now...
Continue your efforts to boost your Youth Quotient
while you wait for the next series of exercises.

Have a great week!

textField.sub: Check your evolution along your Live Young Training.

textField.title: Legal mentions
textField.text:
All information contained on this website is intended to be fun and is provided for entertainment and general educational information only, and shall not be treated as substitutes for professional medical advice and care.

If you have any concerns about your health, diet, lifestyle, or fitness routine, you should consult a healthcare professional.

This web site and its creators assume no responsibility for consequences resulting from the use of this website and information contained herein, and it expressly disclaims all liability for injury or DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, or CONSEQUENTIAL damages or LOST PROFITS arising out of use, reference to, reliance on, or performance of such information.

This web site is provided on an "as is", "as available" basis without warranties of any kind, express or implied.
